name: 古瓊昇
objective:
這門課程探討微電子電路的基本原理和設計技術，專注於集成電路放大器、數位邏輯電路和相關主題。學生將獲得對微電子電路及其應用的全面理解。。
Course Title:Electronics
Description:This course explores the fundamental principles and design techniques of microelectronic circuits, focusing on integrated circuit amplifiers, digital logic circuits, and related topics. Students will gain a comprehensive understanding of microelectronic circuits and their applications.
schedule:
Week 1-2:
Current Mirrors
Principles and applications of current mirrors
Stability and current distribution in current mirrors
Single-stage amplifiers (Common emitter/source, Common collector/drain, Common base/gate)
Small-signal analysis

Week 3-4: Biasing techniques
Design considerations


Week 5-6: Differential amplifiers
Multi-stage amplifiers
Cascode amplifiers
Gain and bandwidth calculations

Week 7-8: Frequency-dependent behavior of amplifiers
Bode plots
High-frequency analysis
Miller effect


Week 9: Midterm exam

Week 10:Class A, B, and AB amplifiers
Power amplification 

Week 11-12: Efficiency and heat dissipation
Power supply considerations

Week 13-14: Ideal operational amplifiers
Inverting and non-inverting amplifiers
Integrators and differentiators
Comparator circuits

Week 15-16: Passive and active filters
Low-pass, high-pass, band-pass, and band-stop filters
Oscillator principles
Design of RC and LC oscillators

Week 17: Introduction to digital logic
CMOS technology and logic gates
Sequential and combinational logic
Memory circuits
Clock generation and distribution

Week 18: Final Exam
scorePolicy:
期中考               30%
期末考               30%
平時成績及作業 40%
materials: Adel S. Sedra , Kenneth C. (KC) Smith , Tony Chan Carusone , and Vincent Gaudet,"Microelectronic Circuits, 8/e," Oxford University, 2020
consultation: Office hour or making an appointment by email
